name: pikelets 🥞
description:
use the arrow keys to move. bump in to benches and cupboards to track down all the things you'll need to make some pikelets. 

--

game made in bitsy (with some hacks)

--

pikelets are small, fluffy pancakes. they can be eaten either hot or cold and are usually served with jam. if you'd like to try and make some yourself you can find my full written recipe here.
